name: Columbia Granger's World of Poetry
description: Columbia Granger's World of Poetry contains over 250,000 full-text poems and over 450,000 citations. The collection includes Columbia Granger's Index to Poetry in Collected and Selected Works, editions 1-2, and The Columbia Granger's Index to African-American Poetry, the Classic Hundred Poems, and Classic Writings on Poetry. Users can search poems by title, first words, author gender, genre, and more.
